task.title: Creating Messaging Users and Groups
task.shortdesc: System Administrators and Messaging Administrators can create messaging users and groups who will use applications developed for the appliance to send and receive messages.

step.cmd: Go to the Users and Groups page by either of the following steps:

choices.choice: On the Home tab, click Messaging Users and Groups in the Create users and groups box.
On the Messaging tab, click Users and Groups.

step.cmd: To add, delete, or edit messaging users use the icons in the Messaging Users box.
step.info:
You can:
Add a messaging user by clicking the Add icon.
Delete a messaging user by selecting the user and then clicking the Delete icon.
Edit a messaging user by selecting the user and then clicking the Edit icon.

To add, delete, or edit messaging groups use the icons in the Messaging Groups box.
step.info:
You can:
Add a messaging group by clicking the Add icon.
Delete a messaging group by selecting the group and then clicking the Delete icon.
Edit a messaging group by selecting the group and then clicking the Edit icon.
